inclusion.criterion: CBD stone removal during therapeutic ERCP

exclusion.criterion: Hemolytic anemia, IHD stone, parasites in hepatobiliary system

notes: 54-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain and nausea. Elevated ESR and leukocytosis with a left shift.
